A follow up to a classic that is itself a classic. The portal gun remains one of the coolest mechanics I have experienced it a game, and the remarkable polish of the puzzles complements it well. There's nothing quite like the feeling of satisfaction that comes from getting through one of Portal 2's puzzles for the first time.

If you have a friend to play with, co-op is just as fun as the main story.

Pro:
Great Story Line
GLaDOS is just as funny as the last game
Would happily play the main game over and over again.
Can run on a ti93 Calculater
Cons:
Wheatley is scum
Could not make Potato GLaDOS into French Fries
Turrets bullets still feel like getting run over by a semi

Overall, If you don't have the game already, Patch that hole in your heart with the power of Cave Johnson!

its good
portal gun go pew pew

Игра отличная, наверное поставлю 9/10. 
Вообщем я советую пройти эту ведь тут есть действительно сложные головоломки, интересный сюжет и много юмора(в том числе и черного), персонажи ну уж очень запоминаются. Так же в игре присутствует кооп и его лучше проходит с другом используя дискорд и т.д. ведь там очень важна командная работа. Конечно можно пройти кооп с рандомным челиком, но это будет сложнее. В коопе так-же присутствует юмор. После прохождения сюжета можно выполнить все достижения (как это сделал я), есть реально сложные достижения, а есть очень простые.
Надеюсь мой отзыв был для вас полезен

This game is just brilliant.  I just now read the negative reviews through curiosity.  I recommend if you are not sure whether to buy this or not then read the negative reviews, best I've ever seen.

Portal 2 is a puzzle game that plays like a platformer of sorts.  There are about 80 levels some of which you can walk into and just instantly know the solution and others...hmm, can take hours.  One thing is for sure, when you get one of those long puzzles and you don't give up, finally solving the puzzle can bring such a feeling of achievement.  I was addicted to this and played it through within a week, brilliant game, great controls, believable environment, fairly good jokes too.

Gostei e zerei o singleplayer e multiplayer 
Eu gosto da ambientação de empresa do futuro destruída e da sensação de estar passando por um lugar abandonado e que pessoas já estiveram ali.
A mecânicas dos portais é muito boa e misturada com puzzles fica muito boa, algumas horas ficava tão difícil que eu pesquisei um detonado. Eu zerei o Portal 1 e 2 e os dois são dinheiro bem gasto
